description:
Astro Duel is a fun, frenetic local multiplayer party game for 1 to 6 players! Prepare for a fierce battle: rounds are quick and death is sudden. Blast your friends into space. Run over their helpless bodies for good measure.

FEATURES

• Battle up to 6 players or add any combination of AI Ships.

• Run over pilots in “Pilot Hunters” mode, battle for the most kills in “Ship Hunters”, or join forces in “Team Annihilation”

• Arm your ship with offensive and defensive powerups including missiles, lasers, jousters and shields.

• Dynamic arenas provide a host of hiding places and hazards – Avoid turrets, death beams, and black holes

• Mix up play with Game Modifiers. Enable asteroids, starting powerups, unlimited dash, and so much more!

• Wacky “Touch” mode – Ships can only turn in one direction! A true "Astro Party" experience.

• Play anywhere – On the TV, on the go, or even face up on a table or floor!

• Play with multiple controller types (including touch screen)
name: Astro Duel Deluxe
intro: Shoot your friends in space, then run them over!
